contextId.information: Just as a mother gently comforts her children, so Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy spoke gently to the Thessalonian believers. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: as a mother comforting her own children

contextId.information: Just as one does not know which night a thief may come, we do not know when the day of the Lord will come. AT: "unexpectedly" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: like a thief in the night

contextId.information: Just as a pregnant woman's birth pains come suddenly and do not stop until the birth is complete, the destruction will come, and people will not escape. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: like birth pains in a pregnant woman
